paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Val30Met, including penetrance data and individual case details.

patients.phenotype: Familial amyloid polyneuropathy (FAP-ATTR Val30Met) with muscle weakness and sensory disturbances

individual_records.phenotype_details: Muscle weakness, sensory disturbances, orthostatic hypotension, vitreous opacity
individual_records.evidence_sentence: We finally diagnosed the patient with FAP-ATTR (Val30Met)

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met mutation leads to the production of mutant TTR, which is associated with amyloid deposits.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation and mutation identification
variants.additional_notes: The case represents a late-onset variant of FAP-ATTR.
key_quotes: A TTR gene analysis isolated the Val30Met mutation.
Matrix-assisted laser desorption ionization time-of-flight mass spectrometry (MALDI-TOF-MS) revealed the peak of mutant TTR.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data focused solely on the TTR gene variant as specified.
